thread.section_title: Sunglasses Shop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sunglasses Shop | au.sunglassesshop.com
thread.title: Lucille Cruise-Burns
thread.title_full: Sunglasses Shop reviewed by Lucille Cruise-Burns

author: Lucille Cruise-Burns
title: Lucille Cruise-Burns
text:
I had great difficulty using the Australian version of the website, which was frustrating. There are obviously some kinks that need to be worked out.
But when I emailed customer service they responded very quickly and helped me put my order through and it was shipped the very next day. The sunglasses were amazing too! I'll definitely look at Sunglasses Shop again when trying to find a good price for designer sunglasses.
